description: When i  use "cinder create" to create a volume,the default multiattach  is false.But then i want to attach this volume to multi-instances,it will failed.   It would be fine we can use a command to update  volume multiattach to True, then we can attach this volume to multi-instances.
title: update volume multiattach  to true

comments.content: When i  use "cinder create" to create a volume,the default multiattach  is false.But then i want to attach this volume to multi-instances,it will failed.   It would be fine we can use a command to update  volume multiattach to True .
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~haobing1
